name: Iron Tides
description: This "rogue-like Viking simulator" is an adventure at sea with epic tactical battles and dungeon-crawler elements. Conscript your warriors and prepare for a new raiding season!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.4 GHZ dual core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 2 GHZ quad core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
